articles.author: Clare Duffy, CNN Business
articles.title: Microsoft says Teams and other services are returning to normal after earlier outage - CNN
articles.description: Microsoft says its workplace communication platform, Teams, and other Microsoft 365 services should be returning to normal after an earlier software update issue caused outages for many users.
